values:
im vomiting out some sort of angsty rhyme
in hours not meant for people to be awake in
my bed is the dishelved mess that i shed this morning 
or rather this afternoon
i will disembowel my ambition and replace it
with some mechanical urge to repeat the same task
notions of abandonment aside
i shall live vicariously through films with happy endings
i am a movie star,i am in love,i do not break 
i will never run out of ammunition
(because your words are bullets you feed me to fire back)
(and i will shoot shoot shoot them in your ear and let
them ricochet in your head)
the television will offer me love,a perfect body
and happiness, 
can you compete with that?
im still ignorant as to why 
im avoiding sleep like eye contact 
with some candy shop owner
and myself being some boy 
with a guilty conscious

i am lost in this
depressing, over thinking time of night
my mind would be racing but its to tired
and i've got an alarm set to harass me
old 80's rock crackling the lone speaker
"poor some sugar on me"
i will be engulfed in this blackness
some form of dismal night
saturated, baptized, resurrected
a raw infant, fresh and naive
i will dream, i will bleed
i will scab and scar and see
save me, save me, save me
its morning

oh if i had the money
to purchase all of your memories
i would by you clean out
so you couldn't help but to forget me
oh what i'd give for the same
eyes squeezed and shut so tight
and i'd give these memories up for a dime
i don't want to remember this
not one ounce, tablespoon or drop of it
not this time, not this time
eyes squeezed and shut so tight
no not tonight, not tonight
if i could pawn them off
i don't care what i'd get in return
perhaps something to make my stomach not churn
i've spent enough nights
wrestling with the sheets
to pay for the days
where i just sit and dream

i think we skipped a beat
in the same fashion my heart does
when you walk into the room
but we're off in our timing
off in all our steps
and we've over compensated
over contemplated
and threw the whole dance off
now we're fumbling about
stumbling over our doubt
if love is the music
we should just focus on the song
our feet will soon follow
and carry us along

p-p-p-please 
you're anything, anything but genuine
and i've got bad habits that turned out better then you
(you are my worst habit)
we both know, the only way to go is for the throat
you said you found me at a secondhand shop in more ways then one
and i've got bad ideas that say you're the worst of them
(you are my worst habit)
but you'll chew me up and spit me out and swallow me whole
all at the same time
and i'll quietly wish that i never called you mine
we all make mistakes b-b-but honey you make disasters
i said we all make mistakes b-but honey you're a disaster

its just trouble we're looking for
don't worry i havn't been behaving myself
since my curiosity is just begging for a response
and im not in it for the attention
this is just so close to being scandalous
and you still spend your nights talking about us
we're what you want and wish you were
be warned and be careful
if you break my heart i might 
end up writing songs about you
you'll be my motivation when i scream
cuz im more trouble then im worth
are you nervous yet?have you broke a sweat?
perhaps you're swelling up with dread
but its not you we're after
its just trouble we're looking for

im just a fad
like last years trend
im outdated and you'll forget
so just pretend that im not
just a fad
like last years color combinations
im outdated and you'll forget 
so just pretend
(i dare you to remember me)
you'll move on to the newest thing
and i'll be shoved in a closet
or left on the floor
kicked under the bed 
with things you don't think of anymore
to rest with possesions of the past
the other things that were just fads

so i broke and made a scene
(man we're brash, man we're abraisive)
but i meant what i said, i meant everything
these words weren't sweet,no they weren't persuasive
(so i broke and made a scene)
man we're brash, man we're abraisive
and sometimes it isn't enough to just be naive
silence was made to be broken,(just like secrets)
so i gave in(or out)or i folded, whichever you prefer
breathe slower and stiller or just stop all together
and maybe just maybe things will get better
(so hush darling hush this isn't a movie
and i wouldn't put my money on it ending like one)
if we're both pointing fingers
then it all comes out even
what is it we're believing in
because somtimes it isn't enough
(just be naive, just be naive)
so breathe darling breathe
just calm yourself down
(this isn't a movie but its an ending)

you either have the best exscuses
or the worst lies
but i can never tell
cause i can't see it in your eyes
hold on
im faultering now
but name one time
where i didn't hold you as tight as i could
to tight to tight
did i hold on to tight?
the best exscuses or the worst lies
we both know i've got the worst timing
the most i could say is im trying
so pardon me im feeling pensive
by pensive i mean blunt
just don't take this to personaly
if you're waiting for me to come around 
you can hold your breath and choke to death
so pardon me im feeling faint
this just isn't where i want to be
lets not be blaming this on insecurities
im not sure what i hate the most
the fact that i remember what it fealt like
or that i havn't fealt that since
its pathetic

i don't really like this one
is too garbled in my opinion

your promises of promiscuity 
lead him to tentitivly tending to where
your inseems meet
what happend to chastity
while you end up sipping your tea
to sooth your conscience pathetically
and you'll place your hands
where you lay the blame 
for where all those risque thoughts came
and once its over the rest of your night
is spent convincing yourself its alright
oh chastity chastity
where have you gone?
where will you be?
because you're slipping away
from this bright eyed naivity

so how about you and me
crash into a sunset 
and dance in the sea
get away from this place
and every little thing
have a moonlit picnic
and share each others dreams
while letting the night go where it leads
lady luck wont' you kiss me somthing sweet
as the sand covers our feet
i'll make those eyes sparkle 
if its the last thing i do
sweety this sunset was made for me and you
i'll pick out some stars 
that shine in the same way you do
and we'll use them to light 
the sand castle i'll build you
so if you ever get lost
you can find your way back 
and i'll be anticipating you

remember when we were best friends
remember when we were hopeful
i think it was about the same time
that we promised it would never be the way it's become
we were bullet proof baby(to bad words are shot from mouths not guns)
i regret that i can remember what it fealt like
the cool air and the smell of your hair
the tempature of the breeze and everything of you and me
i regret i won't purchase any reminders of you
and that film will stay undeveloped as long as you stay on it
i'd like to think that you're just too scared to call tonight
because you're too scared of everything going right
but this song is the sound of me letting go of you
(too bad you beat me to the punch)(too bad you're out of site)
and i'll leave like the breath from your lungs 
that you never gave a thought to
but you'll be gasping for me baby
when its too late and im already drifting away
mingled with the air from the words we wasted today


just so you know
i don't want you to take these to personly

i just want you on my lips and in my arms
you can be my birthday wish this year
and after all of the candles are blown out
it'll just be you, me and my false sence of security
but i won't tell anyone cause' i just want you to be true
but the truth is i stopped wishing for you some time ago
so tell me you don't miss being tangled up on my couch
and i'll believe you, i'll believe you
i just want to see you smile and hear you laugh
you can be my birthday wish this year
and after all the candles are blown out
it'll just be you,me and what we were meant to be
but the truth is i never stopped hopeing for this
we were bullet proof if we were anything
but boy did we take our un fair shar of hits
you can  be my birthday wish this year 
because im still wishing for this

my thoughts have trickled down
into a few stutterd words
you'd know why im so nervous
if you've seen her
and im insecurities begin
with this recidulous grin
and go down to my shoes
as i can't stand still
but refuse to make a move
i'd like to catch her eye
but im too buisy colliding 
with my shy side
cause she is the tingle in my spine
the thought i think all the time
and these few stutterd words
will seep out too hushed to be heard
oh she is the sweetest form of amnesia
and i've forgotten how to speak
now i've forgotten everything
oh she is so dizzying
she sends my head spinning

stitched up
and barely holding together
faking i'm strong enough
to brave this weather
the wind is taking its toll
and its breaking my bones
so lets say goodnight like there's no tommorrow
and i'll give back all of the things i borrowed
cause' for a time your heart was mine
and i'll brave life like stormy seas
but your smile will be the end of me
so i'll blame my misplaced sence of hope
and be so scared to speak i'll choke
but honestly im bursting at the seems
i'd be lying if i said it didn't mean a thing
im just tired of feeling shipwrecked
and im not quite sure how much longer i can take this

this is my most recent one
so hope you enjoy

i'm the arrow you're going to use
yeah, you'll use me
to pierce his heart with pains of envy
so just shoot me
can we get this over with
im tired of being strung along
just pull me back and watch me fly
make sure you're close enough to see his eyes
i'm the arrow you're going to use
yeah, you'll use me
to peirce his heart with pains of envy
so just shoot me
if all your friends broke my heart would you?
i hope all your friends jump a cliff so you will too
don't say you love me, i already know you're a liar
and of these meaningless kisses i've grown so tired
i'm the arrow you're going to use
yeah, you'll use me
to pierce his heart with pains of envy
so just shoot me


finished it a couple months ago
and no its not about anyone

so this is me pretending im okay
and im doing it pretty badly
im sorry i just don't know what to say
i hope he makes you happy
and you can love him like you "loved" me
maybe you can have moments on your bed
like the time you cried cause' i was leaving
and you can think of him instead
cause' we both know where this is leading
but i shouldn't hafto cry myself to sleep
if i could even call it sleeping
its funny how this weather matches my mood
and you thought we were stronger
i guess you had us both pretty fooled
so this is me pretending im okay
so you don't hafto ask questions
or wonder either way
this is me wishing you away
because im tired of this pain
the one that feals like a fist in the gut
and hurts so bad it heats your blood
so this is me, just me
i'll be okay and im letting you see
life moves and so will i
and all of this ends tonight

so if that makes it up to

because the risk of our detriment is so intoxicating
but i need to know im doing this for the right reasons
because doubt ruins all that i had to believe in
and if im in pain atleast i know im alive
because if im numb i might as well die
bleeding lets me know there is still somthing in me
id rather bleed then feal so dank and empty
but i need to know im doing this for the right reasons

because i've made enough mistakes
for the both of us
so stay beautiful like you are
because i've seen enough phasads
to unlearn how to trust
but im willing to learn to fall inlove
will you please teach me
i could easily say 
you inspire my smile everyday
and i love the way
you take my breath away
and i love how the light from the snow 
reflects in those brown eyes
and a peice of my heart falls down 
with every tear you cry
and a frown doesn't fit you
so smile on angel
and my hand will always feal empty
without yours to keep it company
so smile on angel
did you know your beautiful
you must hear it everday
and i hope thats how i make you feal
becuase there isn't another word i could say
that would fit you better in any way

my memorie is a bit hit or miss
so if i can't remember please forgive
but i know i never wanted it to be like this
and i had so many eloquent ideas
that i was going to use to write about you
but they've all slipped out of mind
was it untimely to speak so soon
you can call me a hopless romantic
(or you can just call me hopless)
but i know i never wanted the night to end like this
(i know i never wanted the night to end)
i wanted  a beach a sunset and a picnic
not this un-characturistic argument
there is more playing in my head 
making this more extravigent
but i can't fit the words
or say the right compliment
but i guess this is the end of it


i wrote this back a couple of months ago but didn't finish it till yesterday

why can't today last forever
i'm falling apart
won't you come hold me
hold me together
and my heart begins to knock my ribs
as she clutches my shirt,and it all begins
i lose my breathe and myself in the moment
my thoughts are racing and i can't control it
because the simplest things mean the most
like the look in her eyes or having her close
if you read my lips they'll spell out
that this doesn't mean one thing
it means everything
maybe if i don't fall asleep
tonight will never end
maybe then dreams will be real
then real life would be pretend

she said "just be silent..."
"just be silent and on one will know im breaking your heart"
it's times like these when faith falls apart
and wipe the tears from your face
it's so unbecoming
somone might find out that you cared
now wouldn't that be somthing
wouldn't that be somthing
so i'll just nurse this hurt
while hugging my pillow
but you'll be the last to know
the last to know
and maybe the morning will be saving graces
and i'll feal better then
better then a broken mirrior 
reflecting on all the smiles and snears
reflecting on all the ways i went wrong
you're a contradiction you said it yourself
and i'm halfway there
only three feet to go
i'll be six feet under and in over my head
and you'll be,you'll be the last to know

apologies go out
to those to whom its due
and i'm sorry if you find me obnoxious
or if i have offended you
but i'm an aparent disapointment
and being sarcastic is what i do best
who needs tact
when you have so much finesse
to say its somthing i regret
would be a false sentiment
but i'll indulge you with sincerety
so much critisizem for being me
if im incorrect or aproaching vanity
its good to know i'll always have you
to point out every flaw in me

i know you don't like me blaming myself
but baby doesn't it ease your conscience
and we had the best intentions didn't we
im so sorry i couldn't be what you need
i hope this space is better to you then it's been to me
so barry all your favorite memories
and burn all your pictures of  me
and watch the ashes take flight
on this brittle winter breaze
i know you don't like me blaming myself
but baby doesn't it ease your conscience
and the kindest words would never help
im so sorry thats the way you fealt
i'll take a glass bottle
(i hope)
and label it my hopes
(this space)
with a flick of the wrist 
(is)
and a second in flight
(better to you)
the only thing left will 
(then its)
be the results when it 
(been to me)
and the ground collide
(i hope)
and then i can grow past
(i hope)
all these painful nights

jokes on me i guess, 
was it just my foolishness? 
i thought this was different then the rest, 
but i was wrong, oh so wrong, 
and her lack of effort is only salt in the wound, 
maybe i'll just be able to forget it all soon,
and i have this picture in my mind, 
of me alone walking down the road at night,
and i am willing to give up this fight,
if you want me to, do you want me to? 
do you want me?
i just need somone to call me back from being on the verge of tears,
but we both know you're not much of a phone person

i could get lost in your lips, 
and feal the tingle till my fingertips
or lace my fingers with yours
and if i fall asleep tonight, can i wake up next to you 
because your the only face i want to see 
but please don't wake me up from that dream 
because its the best thing that has happend to me
i could get tangled up in legs intertwined
foreheads touching and arms wrapped tight
my heart has your named signed
i wish i could say we never fight
but its all in how we make it right
can i be your one and only
whatever you want as long as you hold me

your tongue was a loaded gun
and the silence hit me like a bullet
to meek or shy to say the truth
but brave enough to pull it
for all the mercies cast away
my happiness died today
all the that i had hoped to say
untangled in a dishevled frey
such a stinging pain to catch in the chest
a final attempt to lay me to rest
all the blood came rushing over my tounge
in the form of words and driven by my lungs
to shocked to form a sentence
you caught me off guard to say the least
my thoughts blaring, im unsure if you meant this
my desire to go on has ceased
how you conspired this injury and injustice is beyond me
and i'll let go of your hand and make my way to the door to leave

and crammed it into this

your mascara is running from the tears
and your eye shadow is smeared
so tell me 
was it everything you feared
these bones draped with such perfect skin
drowing out the terrors within
a resounding note of inwittnessed sin
and the resinance of our (your) failings again
if you applied good judgment
like you do your lipstick
then you wouldn't so often
be found in these prediciments
so tell me(tell me) who you wanted me to be
because im trying(trying) but its not working correctly
so laugh it up the jokes on me

adolesent romance my hearts on the line
and its time for the futility to shine

like a 21 gun salute to the end

and diseasing this night

faith that the future will come through for me
maybe im just tired or maybe its the truth
but knowing you won't be around
is one of the hardest things to go through
i feal like my back is going to be bare
knowing that you'll no longer be there
i'll never regret those drives spent
confiding in you
long car rides and sleepless nights 
enjoying a boyish youth
we're just growing up,we're not growing apart
